candidates.name: Paul Lonsdale
candidates.why_elect: I have proven ability of getting things done and many years of management and governance experience. I have been a Christchurch City councillor and was involved in all aspects of the council and its subsidiaries. I carry a large amount of knowledge to ensure our community's voice is effectively heard.
candidates.why_stand: I am running for council because I believe we can do better. Much better. As a resident of Halswell I have seen our traffic become more congested, flooding challenges increase and water quality decrease. I will not be swayed by Wellington politics and believe we need better local representation.
